courseWork.title: To secure 2 additional CP Absolutes - Register your business idea at SEE Pakistan
courseWork.description:
Register your business idea online for SEE Pakistan. 
It would not take more than 3 minutes to complete registration. 
Each individual have to register.
Submit the confirmation email at GCR in response to this assignment.
It is optional assessment.   
Pakistan’s biggest and high-voltage entrepreneurial event is back – SEE Pakistan - World Startup Championship 2025!

Applications are NOW OPEN for all aspiring and existing entrepreneurs.
This is your chance to shine on a national platform, pitch your idea, get expert mentorship, and connect with the biggest ecosystem players. Apply now

https://seepakistan.com.pk/apply-now-wsc25/

Deadline to Apply 31 May 2025

name.fullName: Ammar Ahmed BSDS 2020 FAST NU LHR

courseWork.title: Final Semester Project - Writing a Business Plan
courseWork.description:
The project details have already been communicated almost two weeks before during the class. Hopefully, you all have started working on it.
Its a group activity. All members have to report in the project the percentage of his/her contribution. 
Use only the groups that are already communicated.
The AI generated content should not be more than 25%. Otherwise there would be a straight deduction of 50% without discussing who's fault it is?
Use the local scenario, local context, local industry and competitors to defend your industry and market analysis.
Use the attached format of the business plan including the supporting excel sheet to develop financial statements.
Students have to submit the hard copy of this project in proper binding format in my office.
The project Submission date will not be extended and no excuse will be accepted for not submission.
There is a presentation of this project in the last week of the semester.
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
• The project details have already been communicated almost two weeks before during the class. Hopefully, you all have started working on it.
  • Its a group activity. All members have to report in the project the percentage of his/her contribution. 
  • Use only the groups that are already communicated.
  • The AI generated content should not be more than 25%. Otherwise there would be a straight deduction of 50% without discussing who's fault it is?
  • Use the local scenario, local context, local industry and competitors to defend your industry and market analysis.
  • Use the attached format of the business plan including the supporting excel sheet to develop financial statements.
  • Students have to submit the hard copy of this project in proper binding format in my office.
  • The project Submission date will not be extended and no excuse will be accepted for not submission.
  • There is a presentation of this project in the last week of the semester.

courseWork.title: Request for Group Members Details
courseWork.description:
Dear Students,

You all are advised to submit the details of your group members in the following form. Please note: 
Group members will remain the same for all the group activities and final project of this course. 
Maximum allowed members in a group are 5.
If any group submit less than five members in a group the remaining members will be added by the instructor.
Don't add any members without the consent of concerned student.
Only one member of the group can respond to this form.
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
Dear Students,

You all are advised to submit the details of your group members in the following form. Please note: 
  • Group members will remain the same for all the group activities and final project of this course. 
  • Maximum allowed members in a group are 5.
  • If any group submit less than five members in a group the remaining members will be added by the instructor.
  • Don't add any members without the consent of concerned student.
  • Only one member of the group can respond to this form.
